instruction: Please summarize the main points of the article on ESG investments in Asia-Pacific companies.
output: The article discusses the environment and social aspects of ESG investments in Asia-Pacific companies. While some industries have shown improvement in their ESG scores, others have seen a decline, mainly due to natural resource issues and plastic waste. The article notes that companies in the region have made significant progress over the past three years, and some previously lagging ESG performers may become leaders in the future if this trend continues.
